name: Pork Tenderloin
instructions: Mix the garlic, oil, thyme, rosemary, sage, salt, and pepper together to form a marinade
Mix the marinade and the pork tenderloin together and let sit at room temperature for 3 hours
After marinading for 3 hours, position the rack to the middle and preheat the oven to 450˚F
Rub/pat the pork with with the mustard and brown sugar before roasting
Roast at 450F for 20 minutes or 300˚F for 1 hour, until the internal temperature reaches 145˚F / 63˚C
Once roasted, let sit for 5 to 10 minutes.

additional_context.tips: 1.5-2 lbs of pork tenderloin is sufficient for 4 people. Medium Rare: 145-150˚F / 63-66˚C. Medium: 150-155 / 66-68˚C. Medium Well: 155-160 / 68-71˚C. Well: 160˚F / 72˚C
